name: Eco (itch) (Project Dilon)
description:
A 2d platformer in a furustic setting similar to Vector. It will come with two modes: campaign and endless mode. You will be able to upgrade the parts of your Eco based on three attributes: jump height, boost speed, climb speed                                                           *note: some of these functionalities aren't applied yet

Swipe Up = Jump

Swipe Down = Slide

Hold Tap = Climb

*Please consider commenting the game, since we really value any kind of feedback
